meanings.definition: A shrub or small tree with spiny branches and clusters of yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The barberry in our garden has sharp thorns to protect itself.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful barberry bush with yellow flowers in the park.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to climb the barberry but got pricked by its thorns.
meanings.sent4: Her personality is like a barberry, prickly on the outside but sweet on the inside.
meanings.sent5: The barberry bush stood out in the garden with its vibrant yellow blooms.

meanings.definition: The red, sour fruit of the barberry plant.
meanings.sent1: I picked some barberries to make a tangy jam.
meanings.sent2: The barberry fruit added a zesty flavor to the salad.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole a barberry and made a sour face.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the taste of a barberry, unexpected and refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The barberry's sharp taste made my mouth pucker with delight.

meanings.definition: A bright red dye obtained from the fruit of the barberry plant.
meanings.sent1: She used barberry dye to color the fabric a vibrant red.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a stunning painting using barberry pigment.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel accidentally spilled barberry dye on its fur.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks flushed as red as barberry dye when she was embarrassed.
meanings.sent5: The barberry hue added a pop of color to the artwork.
